title: Matrix Model-Based School Education-Science Research Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing secondary curricula and guiding research, proficiency in digital education tools
context.additional_context: Simulating the application of a matrix model in a virtual environment to enable pre-service/in-service teachers to design integrated education-research programs in school settings

learning_goals: The structure of the matrix model can be analyzed and applied to the design of integrated education-research programs
Develop a student research project mentoring scenario using VR simulations and research management matrix tools
Develop an evaluation system for students' subjective research experience levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
